Summary: Found 2 ufos on google moon very good detail!! (READ)
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Schenectady

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was checking out google moon when i noticed a black spot and zoomed in. to my surprise there was, what looks like, a manufactured craft of unknown orgin flying at an altitude of 2000'+\-. i measured the craft and its approx 1\2 mile long and over a 1\4 mile wide at the wings. after catching my breath, i decided this is a manufactured vehicle, so i thought there must be more! i then found an identical craft 800 miles away. the lighting was a little darker, but the vehicle make was the same. i'm hoping someone could answer what these are, or at least let people know whats out there! thanks! vehicle positions: vehicle one: 8*53'37.46"n 60*05'42.26"e (google moon) vehicle two: 22*53'58.69"n 20*15'13.76"e (google moon) * = degrees tom maple 518-334-0564 ps i can send the pdf links if you need! thanks!
